paragraph.heading: 1Managing Projects
paragraph.paragraph: The ability to manage Projects effectively is an important part of any development environment. ENViSioN! has many facilities for easing the management process, to ensure that the development of your Projects is as simple and painless as possible.
Many different development tasks fall into the category of management, but the following facilities are especially relevant:
